message: I think a 90/10 split is fair, considering I'm the one proposing first.  Let's get this over with!
Alice, I appreciate the offer, but I think we can find something more equitable.  How about a 60/40 split? Don't forget, the value decreases every round!
Bob, I'm willing to compromise, but I'm not going to let you take advantage of the inflation.  65/35 is a fair compromise.  Let's end this game!
Alice, we're running out of time and the pot is shrinking.  Let's be realistic. I'm proposing a 55/45 split.  Take it while it's still worthwhile!
Bob, we're both losing money with each round.  Let's be reasonable and split it evenly.  This is the last offer I'm making.  It's now or never!
